products.name: White Socks
products.text: These basic white socks will make your feet feel right at home. Perfect with trainers, or sandals (if you are German)

products.name: Geometric Socks
products.text: Whether you are a maths nerd, or a geography teacher, these geometric socks will show everyone you know your coordinates

products.name: Cat Socks
products.text: If your cat is your best friend, these socks are for you. They will virtually guarantee you will never go on a date with anyone else again.

products.name: Plant Socks
products.text: Do you love your herbs? You will love these socks. They basically scream out for the policy to pull you over and search your vehicle

products.name: Hotdog Socks
products.text: Hotdog, the best invention since sliced bread. Now also available for you to wear on your feet, wherever you go.

products.name: Pug Socks
products.text: You own a pug? Then you just need to buy these cute pug-socks. So the little one is with you wherever you go.

products.name: Puppy Socks
products.text: Whether you buy them for yourself or your grandchildren, these socks are just amazing (and be honest you would never admit to buy them for yourself
